Name: 尾厝
Alliance: Zhangjiang bashê (Zhangjiang eight shê ritual alliance)
Village_Settlement: Weicuo is part of the Gangxi Administrative Village 港西行政村. The population of Weicuo village is approximately 300 people.
Surname_Groups: The main surname groups in Weicuo village are the Peng 彭 and the Wu 吴.
Village_Temples: Damafu 大妈府 is dedicated to Cuifu dama 崔府大妈.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/18 villagers invite Fazhu xianfei 法主仙妃 to go on a procession around the village.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 6/20: the celebration of Cuifu dama 崔府大妈 is held with opera.
